Hyde Park Ice Pavilion - Worth Visiting

Hyde Park Ice Pavilion was built in 1970 and recently has completed a 9 million dollar renovation. This included all locker rooms, ices surfaces, boards, bleaches, lobby, bar, and lounge.

With two brand new ice pads, J.R. Stoneroom bar and Lounge, Hyde Park Ice Pavilion has become a premiere rink in Western New York.

Come Join All The Fun At Hyde Park Ice Pavilion

Hyde Park is the Proud Home of the Niagara Ice Hawks, Hills Hockey Development, Niagara Falls and Grand Island hockey. In additions we have skaters of all different ages from our learn to skate programs all the way to our “senior” leagues. We also offer public skating Fridays through Sundays!

With space for up to 200 people we can hold many different events including birthday parties, graduation, and family reunions. Contact us at 716-285-0715 today.

© Hyde Park Ice Pavilion

Hyde Park Learn to SkateMite and Squirt Programs

In consideration of Hyde Park Ice Pavilion allowing me to participate in the ice skating class(es) in connection with the institution. I agree to release and hold harmless Hyde Park Ice Pavilion and all of their duly authorized agents, servants, and employees, from any and all liability, claims or causes of action of whatever kind and nature, resulting from my participation in, or in any way connected with my participation in the ice skating class(es).

Hyde Park Ice Pavilion

Ice Rates

Summer $150

Fall/Winter $205

Non-Prime Time $160

Rent all the ice you would like, we offer a ton of ice rental options for pick up hockey and parties

Rental Directions

After clicking the button below you will be looking at the schedule for the rink. To adjust your view, hover your mouse over the words "Schedule" on the top left of the page. You can view the schedule by day, week or month. To change to a specific day, click on the calendar on the top left of the page.

Any time that is gray is available. Any time that is orange is booked. Any time that is Blue has recently become available. Both Rink 1 and Rink 2 are shown.

You can also book JR's Stoneroom here, the schedule is also shown.

If you have any questions or concerns, or need help with booking a time please give Mike Carella a call at 716-316-1526

WE ALSO OFFER INDIVIDUAL RATES FOR TRAINING PURPOSES. MORNING AND DAYTIME RENTALS ALSO AVAILABLE AT REDUCED RATE.
Rent Ice Today

Hockey Programs

Let's play hockey!

Niagara Ice Hawks

We have many different options for Hockey players. From our learn to skate program to our Men’s leagues, Hyde Park has a place for your age and skill level.

Please click the option you would like to explore to take you to the information page for each rink offering.

© Hyde Park Ice Pavilion

Parties

Party Central

Many Different Party Choices

The Hyde Park Ice Pavilion is a perfect place for any type of gathering. Birthday Parties, Graduations, Jack and Jill, Baptism, Bridal Showers and Weddings have all been major success.

Book a Party

JR Stone Room

Great times and great friends!

Come check out the JR Stone Room for our fabulous food and drink. Whether after your pick-up hockey game or stopping by for a bite to eat. JR Stone Room will provide you with a great atmosphere and excellent food and beverage.

JR Stone Room

Niagara Sports Tournaments

Best Youth Hockey Tournament experience in the Northeast!

Niagara Sports Tournaments has been presenting youth hockey tournament opportunities since 1990. We provide the best run youth hockey tournaments in the northeast to help provide youth hockey to hundreds of teams throughout the U.S. and Canada per year.

Niagara Sports Tournaments
